WorkItem.Description:
I am behind a rather strict firewall and cannot download the samples through the samples browser.
 
I've downloaded the zip file and extracted it to a folder (d:\Samples). I've configured the browser to store samples locally in that folder.
 
When I am trying to search in the browser, it crashes.
WorkItem.Summary: Sample browser crashes when accessing downloaded samples

Comments.Message:
Hi maximgolov,

  I inform this message to our project manager. He would arrange some engineer concentrate on this issue. After a while, this issue would be resolve.


Thanks
